content.json:
# üñ•Ô∏è DefenderC2 Device Manager - Hybrid Version

## Multi-Tenant Defender XDR Management with Enhanced UI

**User:** akefallonitis | **Last Updated:** 2025-10-16 00:00:00 UTC

### Features:
- ‚úÖ **CustomEndpoints** for auto-refreshed data (devices, history, status)
- ‚úÖ **Enhanced action execution** with button-style interface
- ‚úÖ **Auto-populated parameters** from your environment
- ‚úÖ **Pending action warnings** to prevent 400 errors
- ‚úÖ **Action ID tracking** with auto-population
- ‚úÖ **Full error handling** and recovery guidance

parameters.name: FunctionApp
parameters.label: üîß DefenderC2 Function App
parameters.query: Resources | where type == 'microsoft.web/sites' and kind == 'functionapp' | project id, name, resourceGroup, subscriptionId | order by name asc

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query: Resources | where id == '{FunctionApp}' | project value = subscriptionId

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.query: Resources | where id == '{FunctionApp}' | project value = resourceGroup

parameters.name: FunctionAppName
parameters.query: Resources | where id == '{FunctionApp}' | project value = name

parameters.name: TenantId
parameters.label: üè¢ Defender XDR Tenant
parameters.query: ResourceContainers | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' | project tenantId | distinct tenantId | project value = tenantId, label = strcat('üè¢ Tenant: ', tenantId) | order by label asc

parameters.name: ActionTrigger
parameters.label: üéØ Action Control
parameters.jsonData:
[
  {"value": "none", "label": "-- Select Action to Execute --"},
  {"value": "scan", "label": "üîç Run Antivirus Scan"},
  {"value": "isolate", "label": "üîí Isolate Device(s)"},
  {"value": "unisolate", "label": "üîì Unisolate Device(s)"},
  {"value": "collect", "label": "üì¶ Collect Investigation Package"},
  {"value": "restrict", "label": "üö´ Restrict App Execution"},
  {"value": "unrestrict", "label": "‚úÖ Unrestrict App Execution"}
]

parameters.name: LastActionId
parameters.label: üìù Last Action ID (for tracking)
parameters.description: Paste an Action ID here to track its status

parameters.name: CancelActionId
parameters.label: ‚ùå Action ID to Cancel
parameters.description: Paste an Action ID here to cancel it

content.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Pre-Execution Check - Pending Actions on Selected Devices

content.json:
### üîç Checking for Conflicting Actions

Before executing any action, this section checks if the selected devices already have **Pending** or **InProgress** actions.

‚ö†Ô∏è **Critical:** Running the same action on a device with a pending action will cause a **400 Bad Request error**.

‚úÖ **Safe Practice:** Wait for current actions to complete or cancel them before starting new ones.

**Auto-Refresh:** {AutoRefresh:label}

content.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Currently Running Actions (All Devices)
content.noDataMessage: ‚úÖ No pending or in-progress actions found. Safe to execute new actions.

tooltipFormat.tooltip: Click to copy this Action ID for cancellation

content.query: {"version":"CustomEndpoint/1.0","data":null,"headers":[{"name":"Content-Type","value":"application/json"}],"method":"POST","url":"https://{FunctionAppName}.azurewebsites.net/api/DefenderC2Dispatcher","urlParams":[{"key":"action","value":"Run Antivirus Scan"},{"key":"tenantId","value":"{TenantId}"},{"key":"deviceIds","value":"{DeviceList}"},{"key":"scanType","value":"{ScanType}"},{"key":"comment","value":"Scan via DefenderC2 Hybrid Workbook by akefallonitis at 2025-10-16 00:00:00"}],"transformers":[{"type":"jsonpath","settings":{"columns":[{"path":"$.message","columnid":"Result Message"},{"path":"$.actionIds[*]","columnid":"Action IDs"},{"path":"$.status","columnid":"Status"},{"path":"$.details","columnid":"Details"}]}}]}

### üîç Real-time Action Tracking

**Tracking Action ID:** {LastActionId}

This section provides real-time status updates for the specified action. **Auto-refreshes every {AutoRefresh:label}**.

üí° **Tip:** Copy an Action ID from any execution result or the history table below.

content.title: üìà Live Action Status
content.noDataMessage: Enter an Action ID in the 'Last Action ID' parameter above to track

### üïí Complete Machine Actions History

Shows all machine actions across your Defender XDR tenant. **Auto-refreshes every {AutoRefresh:label}**.

üí° **Tip:** Click any Action ID to copy it for tracking or cancellation.

content.json:
### üñ•Ô∏è Complete Device Inventory

Shows all devices in your Defender XDR tenant with risk scoring and health status.

**Auto-refreshes every {AutoRefresh:label}**

---

## üìñ Usage Guide - Hybrid Version

### Features of This Version
- **CustomEndpoints** for all queries (devices, history, status)
- **Enhanced UI** with dropdown action selection
- **Auto-refresh** for real-time monitoring
- **Button-style interface** for better user experience

### Quick Start
1. **Select Function App** ‚Üí Auto-populates all connection parameters
2. **Select Tenant** ‚Üí Auto-selected from available tenants
3. **Select Devices** ‚Üí Multi-select from auto-populated device list
4. **Check Pending Actions** ‚Üí Review any running actions (auto-shows when needed)
5. **Select Action** ‚Üí Choose from the "Action Control" dropdown
6. **View Results** ‚Üí Results appear immediately with Action IDs
7. **Track Status** ‚Üí Copy Action IDs to monitor progress
8. **Cancel if Needed** ‚Üí Paste Action ID to cancel

### Why Hybrid?
This version uses **CustomEndpoints for everything** (not ARM Actions) despite the name "Hybrid". The "hybrid" refers to the enhanced UI that combines:
- **Dropdown-based action selection** (cleaner than traditional dropdowns)
- **Auto-refresh queries** for real-time data
- **Conditional sections** that appear only when relevant

### Error Prevention
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **400 Bad Request** - Occurs when action already pending
- ‚úÖ **Solution** - Check "Pending Actions" section before executing
- ‚úÖ **Best Practice** - Wait for completion or cancel before re-running

### Advantages Over ARM Actions
- **No routing issues** - Direct HTTPS calls always work
- **Better error messages** - Clear API responses
- **Easier debugging** - Standard HTTP request/response
- **Full auto-refresh** - Works with all query types

---

**Version:** Hybrid (CustomEndpoint-Based)  
**Last Updated:** 2025-10-16 00:00:00 UTC  
**Maintained by:** akefallonitis
